name: fallen-leaves
description: Fallen leaves is a simple slideshow viewer, the photos shows as falling leaves in the autumn.

scripts.build: rm ./dist -rf && electron-packager . fallen-leaves --icon=./images/icon.png --platform linux --arch x64 --out dist/ --overwrite
scripts.deb64: npm run build && cp images/icon* ./dist/fallen-leaves-linux-x64/resources && electron-installer-debian --src dist/fallen-leaves-linux-x64/ --dest dist/installers/ --arch amd64 --config deb.package.conf.json
scripts.cp_js_libraries: cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/* ./css/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/* ./js/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js ./js/ && cp node_modules/jquery-ui-dist/*.js ./js/ && cp node_modules/jquery-ui-dist/*.css ./css/ && cp node_modules/jquery-ui-dist/images ./css/ -r
